channel.title: [PI]Soul Kingdom[PI]
channel.description:
[center][b][center][b]Hey well welcome to the development team of soul kingdom[/b][/center] i have had past expieriences with alot of servers and have been wanting to start my own project and well yea.[/center] [center][size=36pt]My Goals :[/size][/center] [center]* I would like to create a fun server that has alot of things to do[/center] [center]* a server that even for one second you wouldn't get bored on * a server that does not have rude or ignorant staff[/center] [center]* i'd like to have a server on wich there are many things to do * a server that will attract players so people do not get bored[/center] [center][size=36pt]Server Related Topics :[/size][/center] [center]* The base of the server will be project insanity * The server will be all coded before it is released * The server will be unique and have custom minigames that are actually useful * The server will be coded in java * The server will have unique features[/center] [center][size=36pt]Coders we are needing :[/size][/center] [center]* We need 1 server base coder * We need 1 forums coder * We need 3 gfx designer * We need 2 client coder (must know how to work with renamed clients)[/center] We are looking for only trustworthy people and no backstabbers please and thank you. interested in applying for us ? then please choose the format you are applying for and comment with it in this thread. [center]
Applying for : [b]GFX designer[/b] Real life name : Past Expierience : Why do you want to work with us : How long will you be online for :
Applying for : [b]Server Coder[/b] Real life name : Past Expierience : Why do you want to work with us : How long will you be online for :
Applying for : [b]Client Coder[/b] Real life name : Past Expierience : Why do you want to work with us : How long will you be online for :
Applying for : [b]Forums Developer[/b] Real life name : Past Expierience : Why do you want to work with us : How long will you be online for :
[/center] [center][b]Once you have posted the comment please add my email address at : najkausar@hotmail.com[/b][/center]

item.title: [PI]Soul Kingdom[PI]
item.dc:creator: @jamal123 jamal123
item.description:
@jamal123 wrote:

[center][b][center]Hey well welcome to the development team of soul kingdom[/center]

i have had past expieriences with alot of servers and have been wanting to start my own project and well yea.[/center]

[center][size=36pt]My Goals :[/size][/center]

[center]* I would like to create a fun server that has alot of things to do[/center]
[center]* a server that even for one second you wouldn’t get bored on

  • a server that does not have rude or ignorant staff[/center]
    [center]* i’d like to have a server on wich there are many things to do
  • a server that will attract players so people do not get bored[/center]

[center][size=36pt]Server Related Topics :[/size][/center]

[center]* The base of the server will be project insanity

  • The server will be all coded before it is released
  • The server will be unique and have custom minigames that are actually useful
  • The server will be coded in java
  • The server will have unique features[/center]

[center][size=36pt]Coders we are needing :[/size][/center]
[center]* We need 1 server base coder

  • We need 1 forums coder
  • We need 3 gfx designer
  • We need 2 client coder (must know how to work with renamed clients)[/center]

We are looking for only trustworthy people and no backstabbers please and thank you.

interested in applying for us ? then please choose the format you are applying for and comment with it in this thread.

[center]

Applying for : GFX designer
Real life name :
Past Expierience :
Why do you want to work with us :
How long will you be online for :
Applying for : [b]Server Coder[/b] Real life name : Past Expierience : Why do you want to work with us : How long will you be online for :
Applying for : [b]Client Coder[/b] Real life name : Past Expierience : Why do you want to work with us : How long will you be online for :
Applying for : [b]Forums Developer[/b] Real life name : Past Expierience : Why do you want to work with us : How long will you be online for :
[/center]

[center]Once you have posted the comment please add my email address at : najkausar@hotmail.com[/center]

Read full topic
